fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-  Produce an experimental weapon during the night.
- Use a produced experimental weapon during the night on an authorized target. Mandatory or random, unless below ability or **Remote Explosives** are used instead.
- Use a produced experimental weapon during the night on an unauthorized target. 1 Use

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Creating an experimental weapon will give you one of six weapons at random:
> 1. **Drone:** Guess who the target will visit (may guess that they visit nobody). If your guess is *incorrect,* deal an astral basic attack to the target.
> 2. **Laser Rifle:** Deals a basic attack to the target.
> 3. **Remote Explosives:** Plant explosives at target's house. May be detonated as a night action to deal a rampaging, astral, basic attack to the target.
> 4. **Neurotoxin:** Roleblock, Blackmail, & Poison the target.
> 5.  **Landmine:** Places a **landmine** at the target's house. First visitor of that target will be dealt an astral powerful attack. Will grant powerful defense to target when detonated.
> 6. **Mortar:** Deals a rampaging, astral, unstoppable attack to the target.
- Weapons are destroyed upon use; must create another weapon of that type to reuse it.
